work.name: The George washington University
work.summary: Experienced in building highly interactive, cloud-native applications with a focus on performance, scalability, and seamless user experience. Skilled in JavaScript, Vue.js, and Google Cloud technologies, with a strong track record of delivering cost-efficient, high-performance solutions. Adept at integrating third-party APIs and automating business processes to improve workflow efficiency.
highlights: Engineered a dynamic forms App using JavaScript, Vue.js, and Google Cloud Run, integrating Google Sheets/Drive APIs to auto-save responses, and implemented request queuing to batch requests and write once to Google Sheets, supporting 100+ concurrent users with zero downtime.
Cost-Optimized Cloud Architecture: Leveraged Google Cloud Functions‚Äô on-demand compute and Secret Manager for secure credential storage, keeping infrastructure costs at $0.
Streamlined end-to-end testing using Playwright and monitored performance via Google Cloud Logging, identifying and resolving 30% of latency issues pre-launch, achieving 99.9% uptime.
Enhanced user experience by embedding Kaltura API for multimedia form attachments and automating Freshdesk ticket creation for support requests, slashing response times by 40%.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained dynamic, highly interactive front-end applications using JavaScript, Vue.js, and Google Cloud technologies, ensuring scalability and performance.
Collaborated with backend developers to design and implement integrations with Google Sheets/Drive APIs, automating data storage and retrieval for efficient, real-time data processing.
Optimized cloud architecture by utilizing Google Cloud Functions for on-demand compute, leveraging Google Cloud Secret Management for secure and cost-effective credential storage.
Designed and implemented robust testing pipelines using Playwright to ensure reliable, cross-browser compatibility and performance optimization across all features of the app.
Integrated third-party APIs such as Kaltura for multimedia handling and Freshdesk for automated ticket management, significantly improving the support workflow and user experience.
achievements: Engineered a highly efficient dynamic forms application capable of handling 100+ concurrent users with zero downtime, reducing user friction and increasing form submission success rates.
Achieved a 40% reduction in response times by embedding Kaltura API for multimedia form attachments and automating Freshdesk ticket creation for faster support.
Optimized cloud infrastructure, bringing infrastructure costs to zero while ensuring high performance and security by utilizing Google Cloud Functions and Google Cloud Secret Management.
Streamlined application testing and performance monitoring, identifying and resolving 30% of latency issues before launch, resulting in 99.9% uptime post-launch.
Successfully integrated Google Sheets and Drive APIs to enable seamless data-saving and retrieval, eliminating the need for manual updates and improving data accuracy and reliability.

work.name: Oracle
work.summary: Experienced in developing high-complexity, scalable, data-driven front-end projects with a focus on performance, user experience, and system integration. Participated in development of a complex Micro-services Hexagonal DDD Spring Java project.
highlights: Collaborated on a scalable Java/Spring Boot/Oracle JET application, reducing customer onboarding time by 25% through dynamic UI components and CDN deployments for account management automation.
Transitioned on-premise databases to HeatWave MySQL on OCI, enhancing transaction processing by 35% and enabling real-time analytics for over 50,000 daily transactions.
responsibilities: Streamlined deployments using Oracle Load Balancer and Oracle Kubernetes Engine (OKE), reducing deployment error time by 50%, while designing event-driven workflows using Oracle Cloud Functions.
Engineered 30+ APIs with Oracle API Management for various systems, including payments, loans, core banking, and risk management, improving system throughput by 40% while ensuring ASIC compliance.
Increased test coverage by 90% using Selenium for test automation and OCI Logging Analytics for anomaly detection, which resolved 70% of issues before deployment.
achievements: Successfully transitioned databases to HeatWave MySQL, speeding up transaction processing and enabling real-time analytics for large-scale operations.
Optimized front-end applications by integrating Oracle JET with Spring Boot, creating a seamless and highly responsive user interface for better customer engagement.
Delivered scalable and resilient solutions by leveraging Oracle Kubernetes Engine (OKE) and Load Balancer to ensure minimal downtime and fast response times across deployments.
Developed and optimized a suite of critical APIs for core business functions, significantly enhancing the throughput and performance of the system.
Improved testing and issue resolution through automation, resulting in a significant reduction in pre-deployment errors.
